channel.title: Exp in wild...?

item.title: Exp in wild...?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

ok guna make this fast n simple…

how i make it give xp when u atk in wildy? like hwen u atk npc

do i just add the same method as atk npc?

double TotalExp = 0; TotalExp = (double)(275 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerRanged); TotalExp = (double)(150 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);

i just add same thing in attack method?

but wher…? repp+

Read full topic
